name: Glitter*Green, Nanana Wanibe
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Our Stage!" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 3 or higher, put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock, and all of your characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1)] This ability activates up to one time per turn. When your card is placed on the level area, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one character with "Yuri(ゆり)" or "Nanana(七菜)" or "Rii(リィ)" or "Hinako(ひなこ)" in its card name from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Glitter*Green, Hinako Nijikki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Our Stage!" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 3 or higher, choose one of your characters, until end of turn, that character gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may draw a card." 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When your card is placed on the level area, choose one of your green characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your green characters] Choose a card on your level area and a card in your waiting room, and exchange them.

name: Glitter*Green, Rii Uzawa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Our Stage!" is placed on your climax area, this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may put that character into your opponent's clock." 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When a climax is put on your level area, this card gets +2500 power until end of turn.

name: Glitter*Green, Yuri Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When a card named "Our Stage!" is placed on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your other characters with “Nanana(七菜)” or "Rii(リィ)" or "Hinako(ひなこ)" in its card name and this card, until end of turn, those cards get +1500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)

name: Hinako Nijikki
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room with "Yuri(ゆり)" or "Nanana(七菜)" or "Rii(リィ)" or "Hinako(ひなこ)" in its card name, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Glitter*Green, Yuri Ushigome" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Glitter*Green, Yuri Ushigome" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)
flavorText: But I wanna squeeze you tighter!

name: Friend of Saya, Natsuki
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Under the Night Sky" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: Gentle Stare, Yuri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , choose one of your other green characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.

name: On the Stage, Rii
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, 【REST】 this card.

name: Student Council President, Nanana
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", you may choose a card on your level area and a green card in your waiting room, and exchange them. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'll get you an application form.

name: Yuri Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your opponent's stock into your opponent's waiting room. If you do, choose a card in your opponent's waiting room, and put it into his or her stock. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a green character in your clock, return it to your hand, and put the top card of your deck into your clock.

name: Senior of Kasumi and Gang, Hinako
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, choose one of your green characters, and that character gets +1 level and +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Reliable Elder Sister, Yuri
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Moment Between Sisters" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, all of your other characters get the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."

name: Together with Debeko, Rii
text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When your card is placed on the level area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: On Keyboards, Nanana
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose a character in your opponent's center stage, and that character gets +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

name: "Club Show" Yuri
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put the top card of your deck into your clock, and 【REST】 this card.

name: Rii Uzawa
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)

name: Nanana Wanibe
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When your card is placed on the level area, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of green characters you have. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a green card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】 )
flavorText:
If we just blunder through it,
it won't feel like we accomplished anything. Where's the fun in that, right?

name: Our Stage!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【TREASURE】: When this card triggers, return this card to your hand. You may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Moment Between Sisters
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【POOL】: When this card triggers, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock)

name: Happy Christmas♪ Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your characters with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Twinkle Twinkle Little Star" is in your climax area, you may choose a card named "Something in the Warehouse" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavorText: Let's sing and have fun this Christmas-!

name: Happy Christmas♪ Saya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Music》 characters you have is four or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +1000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

name: Under the Fullmoon, Kasumi & Rimi
text: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Music》, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your clock into your stock. 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your 《Music》 characters and this card, and exchange them as 【STAND】 .
flavorText: Kasumi: "Rimi-rin, that yukata looks good on you."

name: Saya Yamabuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Exchanged Promises" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, until end of turn, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1) Put a 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may pay the cost. If you do, deal four damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)

name: Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to one card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "A Big Step" is in your climax area, choose up to one card in your opponent's waiting room, put it on the top of his or her deck, and this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)

name: Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose two cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "STAR BEAT!" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, choose up to one of your characters with 《Music》 or “Asuka(明日香)” in its card name in your hand, put it on any position of your stage, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(4)] When this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that card's level +1. (Climax are regarded as level 0. This damage may be canceled)

name: Starrin'PARTY, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "We Are Poppin'Party" or "Poppin'Party, First LIVE" is placed on your climax area, all of your characters get +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 【CXCOMBO】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal five cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each card named "We Are Poppin'Party" or "Poppin'Party, First LIVE" revealed, choose up to one character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: First Feeling of "Heart Race", Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to three times per turn. When another of your 《Music》 characters is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Choose a character in your waiting room with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name, and return it to your hand.

name: Live House at Sunset, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [Return this card to your hand] When a climax is put on your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: SPACE was created specifically for girl bands.

name: "Twinkle Star" Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room with "Kasumi(香澄)" or "Tae(たえ)" or "Rimi(りみ)" or "Saya(沙綾)" or "Arisa(有咲)" in its card name, and return it to your hand.

name: Melancholic Awakening, Rimi
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3000 power 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "Letter from Kasumi" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 , if this card's battle opponent is level 1 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character.

name: Happy Halloween♪ Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +3500 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , if this card is in the middle position of your center stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "Something in the Warehouse" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

name: Heart-pounding Stage, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , if a card named "Aspired Stage" is in your climax area, choose up to one card named "Letter from Kasumi" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and this card gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 At the beginning of your encore step, you may return this card to your hand."

name: High School Girl, Saya
text: 【CONT】 If the character facing this card is a higher level than this card, this card cannot frontal attack.

name: Caring for Friends, Saya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another card named "Kasumi Toyama", look at the top card of your deck, put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room, choose up to one 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavorText: …So you found it. Your sparkling, heart-pounding thrill.

name: In the Sunlight Forest, Saya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Music》 characters you have is four or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Gentle Elder Sis" is in your climax area, choose up to one card named "Under the Night Sky" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, and put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock.

name: Starrin'PARTY, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(4) Put three cards from your hand into your waiting room] At the beginning of your attack phase, if a card named "We Are Poppin'Party" is in your climax area, this card is in your center stage, and you have other cards named "Starrin' PARTY, Tae Hanazono", "Starrin'PARTY, Rimi Ushigome", "Starrin'PARTY, Saya Yamabuki" and "Starrin'PARTY, Arisa Ichigaya", you may pay the cost. If you do, 【STAND】 all of your opponent's characters, deal X damage to your opponent, and put up to X cards from the top of your clock into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of your opponent's 【STAND】 characters. (This damage may be canceled)

name: Starrin'PARTY, Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "We Are Poppin'Party" is in your climax area, all of your characters get +X power and +1 soul until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of your opponent's 【STAND】 characters.
flavorText: Eh heh heh, It seems fun.

name: Suggestion, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Choco Cornet》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【AUTO】 When damage dealt by this card is canceled, you may put this card into your stock.
flavorText: Um... I think bread would be nice!

name: Under the Night Sky, Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 Your other card named "First Live, Kasumi" in the middle position of your center stage gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]". 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Hey, you should sing with me.

name: Asuka Toyama
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Happy Christmas♪ Kasumi" in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as 【REST】 .

name: Girl Band Mecca, Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to two times per turn. When another of your characters with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
flavorText: Rimi: "My sister and the others decided that they wanted their first concert to be here."

name: A New Start, Saya
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Good at Housework, Saya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is two or less, this card gets +1 level and +1000 power.
flavorText: I make bags all the time.

name: Emotions Gushing Out, Saya
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: Midsummer Beachside, Saya & Rimi
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is two or higher, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room]".

name: Discovering Sparkles, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When you use this card's "Backup", put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I want to join the band too!

name: Choco Cornet Song, Rimi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When your other character becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavorText: My sister and I wrote this song a while back…

name: Sprin'PARTY, Saya Yamabuki
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 This ability activates up to one time per turn. When you play an event, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Good Morning Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room."

name: Satisfied Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card get +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of characters you have with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 2 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: A Scene at Sunset, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 Change [(1) Put two 《Music》 characters from your hand into your waiting room & Return this card to your hand] At the beginning of your climax phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Under the Fullmoon, Kasumi & Rimi" in your waiting room, and put it on the stage position that this card was on.
flavorText: Kasumi: "I'm glad we were able to talk again!"

name: "Club Show" Saya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, and put them on the top of your deck in any order.

name: Shy Girl, Rimi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When another of your characters becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +500 power until end of turn.

name: “Weirdo” Kasumi
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Music》 characters or this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may look at the top card of your deck. (Return the card you saw to its original place)

name: Caring for Elder Sister, Asuka
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 Bond/"“Poppin’Party” Kasumi Toyama" [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Poppin’Party” Kasumi Toyama" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Morning Events, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【ACT】 [【REST】 two of your 《Music》 characters] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: "Club Show" Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Bond/"Kasumi's Younger Sister, Asuka" [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Kasumi's Younger Sister, Asuka" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Wrapped in Curtains, Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 , if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may 【REVERSE】 that character. 【AUTO】 【CLOCK】 Shift, Level 0 (At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a red card in your hand and this card in your clock, and exchange them)

name: Self-introduction, Saya
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your stock is two or less, this card gets +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put a card named "Invitation, Saya" from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one 《Music》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, put the rest into your waiting room, and this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Sprin'PARTY, Rimi Ushigome
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, put this card into your stock.

name: Trading Parts of Their Lunch, Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1000, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn)
flavorText: I'll give you my rolled omelet!

name: A Scene in the Morning, Saya
text: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power. 【CONT】 Assist If there is a marker underneath this card, all of your characters in front of this card gets +500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "Under the Night Sky" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker.

name: "Club Show" Rimi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if the number of other 《Music》 characters you have is two or more, this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

name: Saya Handing Over Choco Cornets
text: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your clock is 0, this card cannot attack. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Kasumi's Younger Sister, Asuka
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Kasumi(香澄)" in its card name, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may choose a character in your waiting room, and put it on the top of your deck.

name: Real Feelings, Saya
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 3000, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +3000 power until end of turn)
flavorText:
You have no idea, Kasumi!! I ruined our concert-!
Made the others walk on eggshells around me! They did everything for my sake!
Does that sound like fun to you!?

name: Sprin'PARTY, Kasumi Toyama
text: 【CONT】 Experience If a card named "Kasumi Toyama" is in your level, this card gets -1 level while in your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of other characters you have with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name is four or more, you may choose a 《Music》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.

name: One Day Manager, Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 When your other 《Music》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a 《Music》 character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】 )
flavorText: I'm the owner of Class 1-A Cafe, Kasumi Toyama!

name: Something in the Warehouse
text: Brainstorm Reveal three cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. Choose a level X or lower character in your waiting room with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the number of characters with 《Music》 or "Asuka(明日香)" in its card name revealed among those cards.

name: Under the Night Sky
text: 【COUNTER】 If the number of 《Music》 characters you have is two or less, this card cannot be played from your hand. Choose one of your characters, until end of turn, that character gets +2000 power and the following ability. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card's level 1 or higher battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room."

name: Letter from Kasumi
text: 【COUNTER】 Choose up to one character in your waiting room with "Rimi(りみ)" in its card name, return it to your hand, choose a card in your hand, put it into your waiting room, choose one of your 《Music》 characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】 ."

name: STAR BEAT!
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Exchanged Promise
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】 : When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】 : When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: A Big Step
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to two of your characters, and those characters get +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.

name: Aspired Stage
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【COMEBACK】 : When this card triggers, you may choose a character from your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: Gentle Elder Sis
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one red card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

name: We Are Poppin'Party
text: 【AUTO】When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, perform the【STANDBY】effect. (【STANDBY】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 character with a level equal to or less than your level +1 in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage as【REST】)

name: Tae Staring at the Stage
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , if a card named "Real Intentions" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, and up to one card named "Hearing a Guitar for the First Time", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Someday I'd like to play here too, but I've still got a long way to go…

name: Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 All of your other 《Music》 characters get +1500 power. 【AUTO】 [【REST】 one of your 【STAND】 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a climax in your opponent's waiting room, return all cards in your opponent's waiting room except those cards into your opponent's deck, and your opponent shuffles his or her deck. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 [(1) Put a card named "Heart Pounding Star" from your climax area into your waiting room] At the beginning of your encore step, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two of your 《Music》 characters, and those characters get the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 When this card is frontal attacked, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room."
flavorText: I was hoping you'd forget about it.

name: Swimsuit Arisa
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal the same damage to your opponent. (This damage may be canceled)

name: Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 Experience If the total level of the cards in your level is five or higher, this card gets +2500 power. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "Moved With Everyone" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 During your opponent's turn, when the damage you received is not canceled, if this card is in your center stage, look at the top card of your deck, and put it on the top of your deck or into your waiting room.
flavorText: Po pi pa pa pi po pa～

name: Way Home, Arisa
text: 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, all of your characters get +500 power until the end of your opponent's next turn. 【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Shut up! I'm not a loose woman like that, all right?!

name: A Scene in the Morning, Tae
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. This card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 1000 multiplied by the number of characters with "Kasumi(香澄)" or "Tae(たえ)" or "Rimi(りみ)" or "Saya(沙綾)" or "Arisa(有咲)" in its card name revealed among those cards.

name: Sprin'PARTY, Tae Hanazono
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, this card gets +4500 power. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "Hearing a Guitar for the First Time" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if this card is in the right position of your center stage, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: Bonsai Girl, Arisa
text: 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】 , if a card named "Arisa Selling Off Tonegawa" is in your climax area, search your deck for up to one card named "That Irritating Girl", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, shuffle your deck, and put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock.

name: "Club Show" Tae
text: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Music》 characters.

name: Arisa Trying Not to Laugh
text: 【CONT】 If there is a marker underneath this card, all of your other 《Music》 characters get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose a card named "That Irritating Girl" in your waiting room, and put it face down underneath this card as a marker. 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to two cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order.

name: Starrin'PARTY, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When a card named "We Are Poppin'Party" is placed on your climax area, if your level is 3 or higher, choose one of your other characters, 【STAND】 it, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: Starrin'PARTY, Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose two cards in your hand, put them into your waiting room, and put up to one card from the top of your deck into your stock. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. 【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 At the beginning of your attack phase, if a card named "We Are Poppin'Party" is in your climax area and this card is in your center stage, put up to two cards from the top of your deck into your stock, and this card gets +3000 power until end of turn.

name: Lunch Break, Tae
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【AUTO】 [Put this card into your waiting room] When another of your characters is put into your waiting room from the stage, if this card is in the back stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return that character to its previous stage position as 【REST】 .

name: Sprin'PARTY, Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power. 【ACT】 [(2) 【REST】 this card] Search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: "SPACE" Owner, Shizen Tsuzuki
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose and perform one of the following effects. "You may put the top two cards of your stock into your waiting room. If you do, choose a level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage." "You may put the top card of your stock into your waiting room. If you do, choose a level 0 or lower character in your waiting room, and put it on any position of your stage."

name: Full of Sparkles, Arisa
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of 《Music》 characters you have.

name: First Live, Arisa
text: 【CONT】 If the number of 《Music》 characters you have is two or less, this card cannot be played from your hand. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card on the bottom of your deck.

name: Part Time Job at SPACE, Tae
text: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Part Time Job at SPACE, Tae" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: "Club Show" Arisa
text: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards in your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck. 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Tsundere, Arisa
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 [Put a climax from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavorText: Just touch the thing and get out of here already.

name: Well-prepared, Tae
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is level 2 or higher, put it into your stock. (Climax are regarded as level 0. If it is not, return the revealed card to its original place)

name: Explosive Summer♪ Tae & Arisa & Kasumi
text: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 , if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character on the bottom of your opponent's deck.

name: Remedial Classroom, Tae
text: 【CONT】 Your other card named "First Live, Tae" in the right position of your center stage gets +1500 power and the following ability. "【CONT】 During this card's battle, your opponent cannot play "Backup" from hand." 【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: High School Girl, Tae
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of characters in your opponent's center stage is one or less, choose a cost 0 or lower character in your opponent's center stage, and put it on the bottom of his or her deck.
flavorText: Can we borrow the speakers from the warehouse?

name: Happy Halloween♪ Arisa
text: 【AUTO】 [Put a 《Bonsai》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named "That Irritating Girl" in your waiting room, return it to your hand, choose one of your other 《Music》 characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

text: 【AUTO】 [(1) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one 《Music》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: Yesterday's Events, Arisa
text: 【CONT】 If you do not have another character with "Kasumi(香澄)" in its card name, this card cannot 【STAND】 during your stand phase. 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, put this card on the bottom of your deck.

text: 【AUTO】 [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. name: Panicking Arisa

text: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.

name: “STAR BEAT!” Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 1500, Level 1 [Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose one of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn)

name: Tae Shows No Interest
text: 【CONT】 If another card named "Self-introduction, Kasumi" is in your back stage, this card gets +2000 power. 【AUTO】 Encore [Put a character from your hand into your waiting room] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: “Poppin’Party” Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: “Poppin’Party” Arisa Ichigaya
text: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level. 【ACT】 [【REST】 this card] Choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

name: “Poppin’Party” Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: “Poppin’Party” Tae Hanazono
text: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room. 【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.

name: STAR BEAT!
text: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul. (【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
